entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Temperature: -16.6°C

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm near Lake Huron. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
